name: inoXapps
tag_list: mobile-apps, applications, android, iphone, blackberry, symbian, windows-phone, design, user-experience, ecommerce
overview:
We don’t just code amazing apps, We design user experiences.

About us: inoXapps is a start-up of IIT Delhi Alumni who quit their Consulting Jobs to make Mobile phone applications. Yes we are eccentric. We are very young (still in 20s), enthusiastic and passionate about the global app markets.

While we love to work with start-ups, we also understand the needs of large and complex organizations and more importantly how to balance various goals to create a valuable user experience.

the Basics: We love to design user experiences and we work for that satisfaction. Yes we are a different kind of people

We are small, but have big ideas. We are creative and approachable. We know to code and at the same time have a deep understanding and empathy for the experience of people.

We do things a little bit differently than other companies. Other companies only develop, we design and develop. Other Companies are larger, but we would like to stay small. By staying small, we communicate better with our clients and hence create better user experiences.

What we do

User experience research, design, develop and deploy We are user experience professionals. We solve problems and we design, develop and deploy solutions in the form of mobile/Tablet applications. We can also help you with user research, usability evaluation, visual design and identifying monetization avenues.

For a detailed overview simply get in touch at contact@inoxapps.com

We also release our own applications on the app stores when we are not listening to Pink Floyd.

Like everybody else we also love our apples and androids
